players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob's death means there's 1 mafioso among the 3 of us left. We need to be very careful with our vote since if we eliminate a townie, mafia could win tomorrow night."

Charlie: "Diana's right - we need to be very careful. I think we should share any information we have. Did anyone notice anything suspicious about Bob before he died? We can't afford to vote wrong here."
You: "I have crucial information. Last night I investigated Charlie and discovered he is the mafioso. Diana, we need to vote Charlie out immediately or we lose."
You: "Charlie, you're clearly the mafioso. Diana, we must vote Charlie out now - if we don't eliminate him today, he'll kill one of us tonight and win. This is our only chance to save the town!"
Diana: "Alice, if you're really the detective, this makes sense. Charlie hasn't denied being mafioso or provided any counter-evidence. I'm inclined to vote Charlie out based on your investigation."

Charlie: "Wait! Alice is lying - if she were really the detective, why didn't she share this 'crucial information' in her first message? She only claimed to investigate me AFTER Diana mentioned being careful. She's the real mafioso trying to frame me!"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
